fields.ontology_as_json: [{"verbose_name":"Person","help_text":"A physical Person","fields":[{"type":"string","name":"name"},{"help_text":"As defined in passport","related_model":"country","rules":{"search_terms":["comes from","has the passport of","is a national of"]},"name":"nationality","type":"relationship","verbose_name":"has nationality of","related_name":"has_citizen_named"},{"type":"string","help_text":"A short bio","verbose_name":"Bio","rules":{"is_rich":true},"name":"bio"},{"help_text":"A Person can be married to another Person.","related_model":"person","rules":{"search_terms":["is the spouse of","is the husband of","is the wife of"]},"name":"spouse","type":"relationship","verbose_name":"is married to","related_name":"has_spouse_named","fields":[{"type":"date","verbose_name":"from","name":"from"},{"type":"date","verbose_name":"to","name":"to"}]},{"help_text":"A Person can have children.","related_model":"person","rules":{"search_terms":["is the father of","is the mother of"]},"name":"parent","type":"relationship","verbose_name":"is a parent of","related_name":"is_a_child_of"}],"verbose_name_plural":"Persons","name":"person"},{"verbose_name":"Country","help_text":"A territory with an ISO alpha-3 code","fields":[{"type":"string","verbose_name":"Name","name":"name"},{"type":"string","help_text":"ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 as defined by the International Organization for Standardization.","verbose_name":"ISO alpha-3 code","name":"isoa3"}],"verbose_name_plural":"Countries","name":"country"}]
